cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 145 mi (235 km) SE of Key West, Florida, and 65 mi (100 km) E of Varadero, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to begin turning northwest later today, then north-northwest on Sunday, moving through the Florida Keys and up the southwest coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches posted for Puerto Rico in this advisory
weather_observation.warning_coast: N/A – no warnings posted for Puerto Rico in this advisory
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys, south and west coasts of Florida, north coast of Cuba, northwestern Bahamas; Puerto Rico is not included
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (Puerto Rico not listed in table)
weather_observation.first_hazard: Arrival of tropical storm-force winds (already passed)
weather_observation.wind: No significant winds associated with Irma expected at San Juan, PR during the next 5 days
